medical_history.chief_complaint: Hairless pruritic papules on the forearms, wrists, and thighs.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms have been present for 3 years. The father recalled trying different topical therapies with no relief, and lesions burned out after approximately 3 years without hair growth returning.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Father has a history of biopsy-proven primary benign idiopathic follicular mucinosis.
medical_history.family_history: Father had a history of biopsy-proven primary benign idiopathic follicular mucinosis that also presented as hairless pruritic papules and plaques; no other family members had a history of follicular mucinosis.
